Cheers![/mnky_testimonial][mnky_testimonial name="Dee End" position="Designer" img_url="1603" author_dec="Supporter"]Last few years I was closely following company activities and always trying out their latest products, and needless to say, I was never disappointed. item.title: Gallery & Portfolio
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_content_width="row-inner-fixed" parallax_bg="" speed="0.20" bg_cover="" row_seperator="no-seperator" top="70px" bottom="0px" row_mobile_style="" row_show_on=""][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Present your hard work

Craftsman theme includes and integrates with amazing Essential Grid. You can use any of 30+ ready skins or create your own in minutes. Easily create portfoliosand galleries from blog posts, custom post types, WooCommerce products or single images. Portfolioposttype will come in handy for creating and organizing your portfolio entries.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]1. PORTFOLIO IS CREATED WITH ESSENTIAL GRID. 2. ESSENTIAL GRID IS INCLUDED WITH THEME. 3. GO TO APPEARANCE/INSTALL PLUGINS TO ACTIVATE ESSENTIAL GRID, IF YOU HAVE NOT ALREADY DONE THIS. 4. YOU CAN IMPORT DEMO GRID FROM DEMO CONTENT FOLDER IN YOUR DOWNLOAD PACKAGE: To import demo grid open Demo Content/Grid Demos and locate demo file inside. In your dashboard go to Ess. Grid->Import/Export choose Import tab (NOT Import Full Demo Data button - this will import all original plugin demos) and choose the demo grid file. 5. PLEASE READ THEMES USER MANUAL/ PORTFOLIO & GALLERY FOR MORE INFO.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_content_width="row-inner-fixed" parallax_bg="" speed="0.20" bg_cover="" row_seperator="no-seperator" top="70px" bottom="80px" row_mobile_style="" row_show_on=""][vc_column width="1/1"][ess_grid alias="craftsman-portfolio"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
